title: Mindful Screen: mindful session timer, break suggestions, calming audio, mini-games, and notes

requirements.text: Create the Mindful Screen app shell with navigation for: Dashboard (timer + suggestions), Games, Notes, and Settings.

quotes: an screen tracking app name mindful screen ... that app should include games ... the app should include a notes option

acceptanceCriteria: App name shown as “Mindful Screen” in the UI header.
User can navigate between Dashboard, Games, Notes, and Settings without page reload issues.
Each section has a clear title and consistent layout.

requirements.text: Implement a mindful screen-time tracker for in-app usage time (time spent actively using the Mindful Screen web app) with a user-configurable daily time limit and session tracking.

quotes: an screen tracking app ... whenever time exceeded the app gives suggestion

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays today’s in-app time (hh:mm:ss) and the configured daily limit.
Timer counts only while the app tab is visible (pauses when hidden) and continues when visible again.
User can set and save a daily time limit in Settings; the value persists across reloads.
Backend stores and returns per-user settings and time-tracking state.

requirements.text: When the configured time limit is exceeded, show mindful break suggestions (e.g., “Talk with a friend”, “Read a book”) and provide a way to cycle to a new suggestion.

quotes: whenever time exceeded the app gives suggestion like talk with a friend or read a book

acceptanceCriteria: When elapsed time >= limit, a prominent “Mindful suggestion” card/banner appears on the Dashboard.
At least 10 suggestions are available, including the examples given by the user.
A “New suggestion” control shows a different suggestion without reloading the page.
The UI clearly indicates the limit has been exceeded.

requirements.text: Add a Games section that includes at minimum: Tic Tac Toe, a simple puzzle game, a riddles mode, and a math problems mode.

quotes: that app should include games such as tic tac toe ,puzzles ,riddles ,math problems, etc.,

acceptanceCriteria: Games landing page lists the available games and allows launching each one.
Tic Tac Toe: playable Human vs Human with win/draw detection and a reset button.
Puzzle: provide a playable simple puzzle (e.g., sliding tile or jigsaw-style grid) with a reset/shuffle action and completion detection.
Riddles: show a riddle prompt with “Show answer” and “Next riddle”.
Math: generate age-neutral arithmetic questions with input validation, score (correct/total), and “Next question”.

requirements.text: Add peaceful, pleasant background music and optional soft sound effects with user controls (play/pause, volume, and mute) and persistence of audio preferences.

quotes: the background music and sound should be peaceful and pleasant so that user will not get distraction

acceptanceCriteria: Audio controls are accessible (at least from Dashboard and/or a global header).
User can play/pause background music, adjust volume, and mute/unmute.
Audio settings persist across reloads.
Audio defaults are non-intrusive (start muted or require an explicit user action to start playback, to comply with browser autoplay policies).

requirements.text: Implement a Notes feature where the user can create, view, edit, and delete notes to store thoughts or day-to-day activities; notes must persist per user.

quotes: the app should include a notes option in which user can store his thoughts or day to day activities

acceptanceCriteria: Notes list view shows note title (or first line) and last updated time.
User can create a new note, edit existing notes, and delete notes with a confirmation step.
Notes persist across reloads and are scoped to the signed-in user.
Backend provides CRUD methods for notes and stores them in stable canister state.

requirements.text: Add Internet Identity sign-in and require authentication for saving/retrieving user data (time-limit settings and notes).

quotes: an screen tracking app ... user can store his thoughts

acceptanceCriteria: Unauthenticated users can see the app shell but are prompted to sign in to save settings/notes.
After signing in, the app loads the user’s saved settings and notes.
Signing out returns the UI to an unauthenticated state and prevents accessing prior user data.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, calming visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, and components) optimized for low distraction.

quotes: peaceful and pleasant so that user will not get distraction

acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across Dashboard, Games, Notes, and Settings.
Use a calming palette (avoid blue/purple), generous whitespace, and clear typographic hierarchy.
UI components (cards, buttons, inputs) have consistent styling and accessible contrast.

requirements.text: Add generated static visual assets for branding and ambiance and render them in the UI (stored in frontend/public/assets/generated).

quotes: mindful screen tracking app name mindful screen

acceptanceCriteria: Generated assets are committed under frontend/public/assets/generated.
App uses the logo in the header and the background illustration on key screens (e.g., Dashboard).
Assets load locally without backend image serving.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo.

Do not modify any files under frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui); compose and use them as-is.
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: Tracking device-wide or OS-level screen time (outside the web app) is out of scope.
Real-time messaging/chat with friends is out of scope.
Third-party authentication providers other than Internet Identity are out of scope.
External databases or third-party audio streaming services are out of scope.

required: Minimal lotus + phone outline logo, calm earthy palette (mindful-screen-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Soft zen background illustration with warm beige/sage tones, subtle gradients, no characters (mindful-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
Set of 6 small line icons (note, timer, gamepad, music, puzzle, lightbulb) in consistent style (mindful-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)
